title: 92/378/EEC: Commission Decision of 3 July 1992 amending Decision 89/3/EEC in regard to health protection measures in connection with imports of certain fresh meat from the State of Goias, Brazil
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 3 July 1992  amending Decision 89/3/EEC in regard to health protection measures in connection with imports of certain fresh meat from the State of Goias, Brazil  (92/378/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: The State of Goias is added to the list of States of Brazil set out in Article 1 of Decision 89/3/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 July 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
